program.name: DART
program.description:
DART (Dallas Area Rapid Transit) has a Discount / Reduced-Fare GoPass Tap Card program. Anyone already receiving public benefits (or meet income/age/disability rules) pay about half price for buses and trains in the Dallas area.

To qualify, you may need to show proof of participation in a qualifying benefits program, meet income guidelines, or demonstrate eligibility based on age or disability status.

After applying, it typically takes about 1 week to receive your GoPass Tap Card.
program.website_description: Half-price transit fares for eligible riders on DART buses and trains

documents.text: Proof of identity (ex: driver's license, official state ID card)
Evidence of participation in a qualifying benefits program (if applicable)
Proof of home address (ex: lease, mortgage statement, utility bill)
